units of measure capacity by class code
class codes capacity uom details for Capacity UOMs by Class Code
section.para: To view a list of Capacity Units of Measure by class code, select the "Capacity UOMs by Class Code" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Capacity UOMs by class code, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Capacity UOMs for all class codes.
Specify class code whose Capacity UOMs you want to display.
Enter a class code pattern to select a range of class codes. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Display lists Capacity UOMs by class code, using the specified parameters.
